verbs.description: Barron Trump [V: was] photographed on the White House lawn on Monday wearing a full Arsenal kit , as DC United players visited the annual Egg Roll for a kick - around with children .

[ARG1: Barron Trump] was [V: photographed] [ARG2: on the White House lawn] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [C-ARG1: wearing a full Arsenal kit] , [ARGM-ADV: as DC United players visited the annual Egg Roll for a kick - around with children] .
